title: 1983 - Man Woman and Child (DTS)
description: A professor (Martin Sheen) with a wife (Blythe Danner) and two daughters, learns that he has a son which he never knew existed. A few years ago while visiting France, he had an accident and an ensuing affair with the doctor who treated him. Now he has learned that she just died and is informed of the son. He then tells his wife, who, while having mixed emotions, suggests that they bring him over to the U.S.  Shortly, after the boy arrives, tensions begin to build. How will this affect their marriage?  Get out the handkerchiefs!
